topics.title: Documentation Link Status Analysis
topics.scope: Research the current state of markdown links across Documentation/README.md sections. Analyze which sections have NOTE comments indicating links need conversion. Inventory all items in Research/, ProjectInfo/, Development/, and Reference/ that are currently plain text list items but should be markdown links. Identify patterns and dependencies for link conversion.

topics.title: Multi-Section Link Conversion Strategy
topics.scope: Develop systematic plan to convert Research/, ProjectInfo/, and Development/ section items from plain text list items to proper markdown links. Determine link targets for each item based on file structure. Plan execution order and verify link validity. Address NOTE tags on lines 23, 34, and 44.

topics.title: Reference Section Link Integration
topics.scope: Address Reference/ section link conversion (line 62 NOTE tag). Convert OPERATORS.md and GLOSSARY.md items to markdown links. Ensure consistency with other section link patterns. Verify all cross-references remain valid across entire Documentation/README.md file.

feature_description: research the NOTE tags in /home/benjamin/Documents/Philosophy/Projects/ProofChecker/Documentation/README.md in order to create a plan that addresses all of them systematically
